DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the feasability to determine the difference of tumoral metabolism before and after artificial nutrition.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Tumor Glucose Metabolism Before and After Artificial Nutrition
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation of the feasability to determine the difference of tumoral metabolism before and after artificial nutrition. This activity will be measured with TEP/TDM 18F-FDG
DOC.criteria: VADS cancer or oesophageal cancer Evaluation by 18FFDG PET denutrition with weight loss of 5% Artificial nutrition ECOG<2 Treatment by chemotherapy, surgery unless 2 months Treatment by radiotherapy unless 4 months Capillar glycemia >12mmol/l during the PET
DOC.keyword: denutrition in Head and Neck cancer or oesophageal cancer
